Type Alias# SpotLightComponent.Shadow.ShadowMapCullMode

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
typealias ShadowMapCullMode = MaterialParameterTypes.FaceCulling
```
